DataElement.preferredName: How Many Smoking Cessation And Refrain from Smoking Occurrence Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of times that you have tried to quit smoking or refrained from smoking.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If you currently smoke, how many times in the past 12 months have you tried to quit smoking and not smoked for at least 24 hours?
